content.p: We are a broad-based faculty of nine different disciplines, five of which were ranked in the national top ten within their disciplines in the Research Excellence Framework 2021. Our multidisciplinary research culture transforms lives, shapes the future and improves societies across the world. Our research strengths include the study of: We also support world-leading centres and institutes within our schools and departments.
